price: 125. Il dira : « Seigneur, pourquoi m’as-Tu ramené aveugle quand autrefois j’étais voyant ? »
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
